description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ag1n","text":"Microscale thermophoresis (MST) is a powerful tool to measure the affinities of interactions between proteins.  We present here our method for determining the binding of Rab29 GTPase to the LRRK2 (Leucine rich repeat kinase 2) N-terminal Armadillo domain.  Work from several labs has shown that Rab29 can recruit LRRK2 to the Golgi, where it normally resides, or to other compartments, when artificially relocalized to another cellular compartment.  MST has enabled us to define the precise binding site for Rab GTPases on the LRRK2 Armadillo domain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brbb9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"6n6p4","text":"Eppendorf LoBind tubes 0.5mL Catalog No. 0030108434\n\nEppendorf LoRetention tips 0.1-10uL Catalog No. 022493018","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3g4vo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bg9ls","text":"pET21b HisSumo Rab29 full length wild type (tag cleaved off)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e7cf","text":"Buffer: 50mM Hepes pH 8, 100mM NaCl, 5mM MgCl2, 20µM GTP, 0.2mM TCEP, 5% glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"sub","offset":45,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8onjl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19vlu","text":"Use either a Nanotemper “A-Column” provided in labeling kit or (our preference) 0.5 ml Zeba Spin column 7MWCO. Twist off bottom of column and loosen cap.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r2pq","text":"Prespin column: Centrifuge at 4°C 1500xG for 1 min to remove storage solution.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rv5c","text":"Apply 300µL of buffer to center of resin bed and centrifuge at 1500xG for 1min. Do this 4X.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54a5","text":"Place column in fresh collection tube. Apply 100µL of your sample to resin and spin at 1500xG for 2min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3oloj","text":"Protein is in collected flowthrough.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ndgg","text":"font-family:Arial'\u003eDye is resuspended in 25µl DMSO as per protocol from Nanotemper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4s9rp","text":"font-family:Arial'\u003eSet up 100µL labeling reaction using a 3:1 ratio of dye to","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4545s","text":"protein; Dye is used at final concentration of 30µM; buffer exchanged Armadillo","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rc8t","text":"is used at a final concentration of 10µM (note: reducing reagent will interfere","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"s3b","text":"font-family:Arial'\u003eAdd above buffer to bring volume to 100µL final volume, mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48fu8","text":"font-family:Arial'\u003eDesalt excess dye using column B provided in kit or another","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ao4m","text":"font-family:Arial'\u003eSpin labeled sample hard 14000xg for 10min at 4°C to remove","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9k6l9","text":"font-family:Arial'\u003eTake absorbance 280nm of labeled protein and use extinction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"akpcj","text":"coefficient and the Nanotemper Degree of Labeling (DOL) calculator to determine","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
